title: General
fullText:
The supply lead for connection of boats to the low-voltage electrical supply of a marina shall comply with Clauses 3.5.2.2 to 3.5.2.4.
NOTES:
1	The supply lead should comprise a single length of flexible cord or cable without any intermediate joins. If joins are necessary they should be constructed and located so as to have a degree of protection, in accordance with AS 60529, of not less than IPX6.
2	See also AS/NZS 3004.1, Clause 3.1.
